SELECT BOOK_THUMBNAIL, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_NO, BOOK_STATE, BOOK_ISBN, BOOK_SUPPLE, (SELECT TO_CHAR(RETURN_DUE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM BORROW BOR WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BOR.BOOK_NO) RETURN_DUE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM B_RESERVATION BR WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BR.BOOK_NO) RESV_COUNT FROM BOOK B WHERE
BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%${query}%'
(BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%${query}%')
ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
